@McBoingBoing:
U possibly dont knw d meaning of Hard Coded Subs..as far as my rip is concerned i hav muxed the subs not 'HARD CODED' it....pullin ur hair and shoutin WTF wont make the subtitles go away....
If u use VLC
right click>video>subtitles track>disable
Do the same thing for other player if u use them (disable the subtitle track)
If u are still shoutin WTF WTF google "How to disable subtitles" many people can provide u wit sum nice answers might help you.
AND FYI no one is dat foolish to hard code english subs wit english audio i do that for my many foreign downloaders who sumtym face problem wit the ascent...
